flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: CASCOON makes its protective cocoonnby wrapping its body entirely with anfine silk from its mouth. Once the silkfgoes around its body, it hardens.nThis POKéMON prepares for its evolutionninside the cocoon.

If it is attacked, CASCOON remainsnmotionless however badly it may benhurt. It does so because if it were tofmove, its body would be weak uponnevolution. This POKéMON will also notnforget the pain it endured.
To avoid detection by its enemies, it hidesnmotionlessly beneath large leaves and innthe gaps of branches. It also attachesndead leaves to its body for camouflage.
Its body, which is made of soft silk,nhardens over time. When cracks appear,nevolution is near.
Its body, which is made of soft silk,nhardens over time. When cracks appear,nevolution is near.
It is hot inside its cocoon. Allnthe cells in its body create thenenergy for it to evolve.
Encased within its tough cocoon, itnendures attacks. It never forgetsnthe appearance of its foes.
It never forgets any attack itnendured while in the cocoon.nAfter evolution, it seeks payback.
It endures attacks with patience,nbecause the more pain beforenevolution, the sturdier it becomes.
It endures attacks with patience,nbecause the more pain beforenevolution, the sturdier it becomes.
Rancunier, il n’oublie aucune desnattaques subies dans le cocon etnse venge une fois qu’il a évolué.
It never forgets any attack itnendured while in the cocoon.nAfter evolution, it seeks payback.
Rancunier, il n’oublie aucune desnattaques subies dans le cocon etnse venge une fois qu’il a évolué.
It never forgets any attack itnendured while in the cocoon.nAfter evolution, it seeks payback.
It never forgets any attack itnendured while in the cocoon.nAfter evolution, it seeks payback.
It never forgets any attack itnendured while in the cocoon.nAfter evolution, it seeks payback.
やわらかい　いとで　できた　からだはnじかんと　ともに　かたくなっていく。nひびわれると　しんかは　まぢかだ。
부드러운 실로 된 몸은n시간이 지나면서 단단해진다.n진화가 임박하면 갈라지기 시작한다.
Son corps, constitué de soie fine, durcit avec lentemps. Si vous voyez apparaître des fissures, c’estnqu’il va très bientôt évoluer.
Sein aus weicher Seide bestehender Körper erhärtetnmit der Zeit. Sobald Risse sichtbar sind, steht dienEntwicklung kurz bevor.
Está formado por seda que se endurece poco anpoco. Si se resquebraja el capullo, está a puntonde evolucionar.
Il corpo di soffice seta si indurisce nel corso delntempo. Quando appaiono crepe, l’evoluzione è vicina.
Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens overntime. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
やわらかい　糸で　できた　体はn時間と　ともに　硬くなっていく。nひび割れると　進化は　間近だ。
マユに　こもっている　あいだにnうけた　こうげきは　しんかしてもnわすれずに　かならず　しかえしする。
고치에 들어가 있는 사이에n받은 공격은 진화해도n잊지 않고 반드시 앙갚음한다.
Rancunier, il n’oublie aucune des attaques subiesndans le cocon et se venge une fois qu’il a évolué.
Es vergisst keinen Angriff, den es im Kokon erduldennmusste. Nach der Entwicklung sinnt es auf Rache.
Jamás olvida a quienes lo atacaron mientras estabanen su capullo. Cuando evoluciona, busca venganza.
Non dimentica mai gli attacchi subiti dentro il bozzolo.nDopo l’evoluzione cerca di vendicarsi.
It never forgets any attack it endured while in thencocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
マユに　こもっている　あいだにn受けた　攻撃は　進化してもn忘れずに　かならず　仕返しする。
マユルドの　からだは　くちから　だした　ほそいnいとが　からだを　つつみ　かたくなった　もの。nマユの　なかで　しんかの　じゅんびを　している。
카스쿤의 몸은 입에서 나온 가는n실이 몸을 둘러싸 딱딱해진 것이다.n고치 안에서 진화의 준비를 하고 있다.

Blindalys fabrique son cocon protecteur en s’enveloppantndans la soie qui sort de sa bouche. Une fois la soie autournde son corps, elle se met à durcir. Ce Pokémon préparenson évolution à l’intérieur du cocon.

Panekon baut seinen schützenden Kokon, indem es seinennKörper mit feiner Seide einwickelt, die aus seinem Mundnaustritt. Wenn sein Körper mit Seide bedeckt ist, wird diesenhart. Im Kokon wartet es auf seine Entwicklung.
Cascoon forma el capullo que lo protege enrollándose porncompleto en la seda que libera por la boca. Cuando estántotalmente recubierto, se prepara para evolucionar en elninterior del capullo.

Cascoon crea il bozzolo protettivo avvolgendo interamentenil proprio corpo con finissima seta secreta dalla bocca.nSuccessivamente la seta si indurisce. A questo punto Cascoonnsi prepara all’evoluzione.

Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its bodynentirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goesnaround its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for itsnevolution inside the cocoon.
マユルドの　体は　口から　出した　細いn糸が　体を　包み　硬くなった　もの。nマユの　中で　進化の　準備を　している。
うごくと　つよい　からだに　しんか　できないのでnどんなに　いためつけられても　じっと　している。nそのとき　うけた　いたみは　ずっと　わすれない。
움직이면 튼튼한 몸으로 진화할 수 없어서n아무리 괴롭혀도 가만히 있는다.n그때 느낀 아픔을 계속 잊지 않는다.

Lorsqu’il est attaqué, Blindalys reste immobile, même s’il antrès mal. En effet, s’il bougeait, son corps serait affaibli lorsnde son évolution. En revanche, ce Pokémon n’oubliera pasnla douleur endurée.

Wenn es angegriffen wird, bewegt sich Panekon innkeiner Weise, egal, wie schwer es dabei verletzt wird.nWenn es sich bewegen würde, wäre sein Körper zunschwach für seine Entwicklung. Die Schmerzen allerdingsnvergisst es nie.
Si atacan a Cascoon, se queda inmóvil aunque le hayan hechonmucho daño, puesto que, si se moviera, perdería fuerzas paranevolucionar. Nunca olvida el daño que le han hecho.

In caso di aggressione Cascoon rimane immobilenindipendentemente dalla violenza dell’attacco subito.nQuesto lo aiuta a evitare di indebolire il suo corpo in vistandell’evoluzione. Non dimentica mai il dolore provato.

If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly itnmay be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its bodynwould be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also notnforget the pain it endured.
動くと　強い　体に　進化　できないのでnどんなに　痛めつけられても　じっと　している。nそのとき　受けた　痛みは　ずっと　忘れない。
